Description:
Handle inbound and outbound calls to or from customers
Greetings VIP visitors, directing them to their desired location, providing information about the properties.
The agents will be responsible for effective communication on all reservations (restaurants, hotels, private drivers and cars, any special events/exhibitions or tours)
Agents will be responsible for responding to tenant facility management.
Handle customer complaints
Follow up with customer calls
Provide monthly report
Collecting and reporting customer feedbackSkills
Skills:
Bachelor degree or equivalent
Minimum 3 years of similar experience in concierge
Fluent in English and Arabic
Immediate joiners
